name: Quick memory
description:
Quick memory will challenge your short-term memory.

Will you remember the color you just saw? 
Hopefully you will and in the next step you need to find that color. 

Simple as that!

You will find the difficulty settings in the main menu at the bottom

I am looking for ways to improve this mini-game so please drop a comment with your suggestions on how to make the game more varied, challenging or whatever you think might be a good idea.

Many thanks!
